page.title: 20Events
page.content: Forteviot's manual signal box is being altered this year.The level crossing of gates is being replaced by an automatic barrier and will be operational by November. In preparation for this change the southern access road has been not only widened,but it's gradient has been raised.And where priority had previously been given to the Forteviot B935 Aberdalgie road priority has now been given to the Dunning-Aberdalgie road. During this change the Forteviot road users had to adhere to traffic lights and so could only use one side of the narrow road at a time for about a fortnight. As a result of this change there are to be some job losses.
